Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Menard
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Austin, Division, Central, and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Menard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Austin, Division, Central, and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Menard.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Throop
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Loomis, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Throop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Loomis, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Throop.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Midway
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Midway. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Midway.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
